text: Leonid Kostyantynovych Kadenyuk (, 28 January 1951 – 31 January 2018) was a Ukrainian astronaut. He was the first astronaut of independent Ukraine. He flew on NASA's Space Shuttle Columbia in 1997 as part of the international mission STS-87. Леонид Константинович Каденюк Biography on Peoples.ru Kadeniuk held the rank of Major General in the Ukrainian Air Force. He was born in Klishkivtsi, Chernivtsi Oblast. Kadeniuk died on 31 January 2018, three days after turning 67 in Kyiv.Ukraine’s first astronaut Leonid Kadenyuk dies at 67 Kyiv Post, 31 January 2018First Ukrainian cosmonaut Leonid Kadeniuk dies Interfax, 31 January 2018 ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Ukrainian people Category:Astronauts
title: Leonid Kadeniuk
